message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you is $12000. I believe this is a fair starting point for our negotiation.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. Considering the product's value to me is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16500. This is a fair compromise, taking into account your budget and the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $15000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that price?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, but I'm afraid I'm at my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'd like to make one final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from another seller.
